query: Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder gravel race Southeast North Carolina (Holly Shelter Game Land)

videos.title: Holly Shelter Game lands and Gravel Bikes with Bike Cycles
videos.description: The fun that can be had riding out in the 63,000 acre North Carolina Public Game Lands is fantastic.   Almost any type of bicycle with tires wider than 38mm will work on most of the roads.   A lot of people ride 38-48mm tires and some even use fat bikes.  This specific scene was filmed using a drone about 12 miles from the Highway 17 gate.  Always watch out for wildlife, bears, snake, alligators and when the gates are open to vehicles (hunting season) watch for vehicles.  Come see us at Bike Cycles and we can show you what you need to get out there and have fun!

videos.title: Where's the Gravel: A Solo Cycling Adventure Ride Through Holly Shelter North Carolina Cycling Vlog
videos.description: Join Where's the Gravel on a solo cycling adventure ride through Holly Shelter, North Carolina.  This cycling vlog takes you from Wilmington North Carolina to Swansbo North Carolina.  This 98 mile ride with a slice of gravel in the middle, will test any cyclist.  Holly Shelter is the home of the Holly Shelter Gravel Grinder hosted by Trans-Sylvania Productions.  For more info checkout www.wheresthegravel.com or www.weeklyrides.com.
tags: Where's the Gravel a solo cycling adventure ride through holly shelter north carolina cycling vlog

videos.title: Holly Shelter Typical following to close.
Globe to Maple Sally - Maple Sally 53 Gravel Route
videos.description:
"Gopro makes things look flat." Yes, yes it does, which is why I wanted to make a summary video of one of my favorite gravel routes in North Carolina. Good company, good gravel, good views.

I might have trashed an external drive making this.

Route can be found here: https://ridewithgps.com/routes/32125990

**

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thekidpjtinsley/

Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2430535

videos.title: 2022 Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder - Full Jeep Climb
videos.description:
From the 2022 Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder by Trans-Slyvania Productions. 
The infamous Jeep Climb, or Falls Dam Trail, from bottom to top.
